name: Headsetera
tag_list: cloud-pbx, hosted-pbx, hosted-voip-pbx, cloud-phone-system, cloud-pbx-internet-phone-service, plantronics-headsets, head-phones, headsets, head-sets, uc-headsets, call-center-headsets, pc-headsets, voip-headsets
overview:
Headsetera provides the leading headset brand, and cloud PBX services to businesses thoriught the U.S.

As an Authorized Dealer for quality Plantronics headsets, Headsetera stocks a large selection of headsets for offices, call centers, VoIP / PC, unified communication, mobile phones and gaming.

Headquartered in Raleigh, NC, the company is woman-owned and offers Free same-day shipping, up to 2 years manufacturer warrantees, and 24/7 support.

As a Certified Dealer for RingCentral’s cloud phone system, Headsetera helps small and mid-size businesses dramatically reduce costs while enjoying enterprise-class call, text, fax and message handling for their customers at an all-inclusive low monthly rate and no contract requirement.

With only an Internet connection, business owners can now be up and running in minutes, with no premise based equipment (desk phones optional), maintenance costs or set-up fees, while re-using their existing telephone numbers.

Long distance costs are a thing of the past, and RingCentral’s VoIP phone system can also help franchises, realtors, retailers and insurance brokers connect multiple offices under one dialing plan, one bill, and one centralized Internet-based administration portal.

Headsetera also offers VoIP desk phones and conference telephones from Polycom and Cisco.
